H0.text: What name is given to a painful infection of the tip of a finger. Felon

H1.text: What name is given to a painful infection of the tip of a finger. Paronychia

H2.text: What name is given to a painful infection of the tip of a finger. Dactylitis

H3.text: What name is given to a painful infection of the tip of a finger. Whitlow

A4.text: A whitlow or felon is an infection of the tip of the finger.

A5.text: paronychia is an infection of the tissue at the side or base of the nail.
